闡.definition: to express; to disclose; to enlighten; to open

闡明.definition: to elucidate; to explain clearly; to expound

闡發.definition: to elucidate; to expound; to study and explain

闡述.definition: to expound (a position); to elaborate (on a topic); to treat (a subject)

闡釋.definition: to explain; to expound; to interpret; elucidation
